Package com.j2igf.framework.graphics.auxiliary

Class FontAtlas

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual.Sprite
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.auxiliary.FontAtlas
public class FontAtlas extends Sprite
This class is used to create a font atlas for a given font.
Author:
Aryan Rai

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final int

    The line spacing of the font atlas.

  • Constructor Details

    • FontAtlas

      public FontAtlas(String fontName, int fontSize, boolean antiAliased)
      This is the constructor of the FontAtlas class. It constructs a font atlas for the given font.
      Parameters:
      fontName - the name of the font
      fontSize - the size of the font
      antiAliased - whether the font should be anti-aliased or not

  • Method Details

    • textToSprite

      public Sprite textToSprite(String text, int color)
      This method uses the current font atlas to create a sprite of any string in any color.
      Parameters:
      text - the string to be converted to a sprite (the string must only contain characters that are in the font atlas)
      color - the color of the string
      Returns:
      an object of the Sprite class that represents the sprite of the given string in the given color

    • getOffset

      public int getOffset(int ch)
      This method return the x-offset of the given character in the font atlas.
      Parameters:
      ch - the character whose x-offset is to be returned (the character must be in the font atlas)
      Returns:
      the x-offset of the given character in the font atlas

    • getGlyphWidth

      public int getGlyphWidth(int ch)
      This method returns the width of the given character in the font atlas.
      Parameters:
      ch - the character whose width is to be returned (the character must be in the font atlas)
      Returns:
      the width of the given character in the font atlas

    • getLineSpacing

      public int getLineSpacing()
      This method returns the line spacing of the font atlas.
      Returns:
      the line spacing of the font atlas

    • setLineSpacing

      public void setLineSpacing(int lineSpacing)
      This method sets the line spacing of the font atlas.
      Parameters:
      lineSpacing - the new line spacing of the font atlas
